elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Orientation level students are always allowed to complete taster apprenticeships in your company.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What security measures and restrictions are in place to ensure that tasters get a real insight into the work and can also participate, but do not have access to non-public business documents?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Ask at the training company and exchange ideas in a small group.
